section.title: Running and changing the examples
section.para: Now that you have used an application created for [[NAME]] we will now look at how to develop one of your own. This chapter explains how to build, run and modify a prototype.

section.title: Compiling and running an example
section.para: The examples directory contains a couple of examples. Here we will use the expenses one. After going to the directory we can use Ant to compile and run the code.
section.literallayout:
$ cd example/expenses $ ant Buildfile: build.xml
